title: Ahli38
author: Ahli38
content: today may be such a difficult day in my life. but this is where I found a meaning of family.those who wake me up when I fall.those who cheered me up when I was about to give up.those who always bring happiness even in simplicity.They always make me laugh when my heart is full of pain.those who always respect and glorify me when others insult and demean me.They are always there for me in my good and bad times.that's what family means to me.

comments.author: Israelgogo
comments.body: Family is a place or an association which supports each other and see each other grow, families stay by each other,families help ,protect,guild and are even there for you in your absence, they can vouch for you.Families are love once, caring,united.When one is affected,then all is affected,they check up on each other. Friends can turn family, Families can be friends

comments.author: Abbee
comments.body: Family isn't related to blood alone,Family is society or group of persons created by a strong bond connection.  Families are people who believe in you when others don't believe in you.Families are people who genuinely care for you.Families are people who stood by you when things goes wrong.Families are people who have a choice to neglect you but they didn't because you matters to them.Families are people who will protect you no matter what.

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: Family and friends are the closest people who accept you both cheerful and sad. Just yourself. And they love you for it

comments.author: Mask00
comments.body: Family  Its Big Word. Its Most important in our life. If you Don't have Family Then You Know what is Family. If You Have Family I request You Guys Everyone please Time span with your Family because man is Mortals  anytime anywhere anyone can die. So Family is Important

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Family can be double edge sword, they're very important on our life, but sometime they will control everything 100% even we don't like it.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Single Word , FAMILY for me is "EVERYTHING" there is nothing that i can call without my family so yes They are my everything.

comments.author: chexychukra
comments.body: Family can be any group of people, the most important thing is to find it and save it

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Ahli38 on June 02, 2022, 02:52:46 PMtoday may be such a difficult day in my life. but this is where I found a meaning of family.those who wake me up when I fall.those who cheered me up when I was about to give up.those who always bring happiness even in simplicity.They always make me laugh when my heart is full of pain.those who always respect and glorify me when others insult and demean me.They are always there for me in my good and bad times.that's what family means to me.wow when i saw this my spirit was uplifted , and i was actually missing the moments i have spent with them during festive periods, to me family is everything, those are people that have gotten my back when ever there is trials , they are people that will always accept me back, no matter what have done.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Family is one of the most important things anybody has in their life. You can have all the money & all the success possible but if you don’t have a family or at the least, a close group of friends then you will find it hard to live a happy life.Treat your family well & protect them.

comments.author: Joswa Russell
comments.body: It means to cherish those people in your life who make your day better. Family isn't necessarily blood-related.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I think family is very important and maintaining those relationships really mean a lot to me. The older I get the more I lose regular contact with them but the love I have for my parents and siblings will never waver.It’s important to at least check in with everybody just to make sure they’re ok and healthy but I don’t have those kind of relationships where any of us talk regularly.    I still don’t have my own family or kids but I think family is important because unlike friends or lovers you share blood with your immediate family.

comments.author: Chato1977
comments.body: family for me is forever , the one that I can lean on at any cost , the one that will never leave me in any trouble that i ill be in to.and Family is my Life.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Joswa Russell on August 05, 2022, 09:25:28 AMIt means to cherish those people in your life who make your day better. Family isn't necessarily blood-related.You are right family those not necessarily need to be blood, family is those people that always stand by you when you have nothing, the people that are ready to risk there own things just for you to get. Some family members don’t care about your life, you are just related by blood.

comments.author: RoverBlack
comments.body: I think this is one of the most important things in my life

comments.author: Kalchef
comments.body: Yeah, I am just starting my own family with wife and kid but from my own family I have very bad experience, half love, deceit, probably because I am from a polygamous family, no genuine love but pretends, you guys that talk love from family are lucky, mine is a different story.

comments.author: poloneix
comments.body: regarding family, they are the most important figures in our lives, when we are alone there are figures of them who make our lives more colorful

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: Family is the most valuable thing in my life. I learned from the meaning of family, to always understand each other, take care of each other, and continue to give encouragement to a family member who feels his life is in turmoil.Family is a place where we respect and love each other. complement each other's strengths and weaknesses.

comments.author: Sanni_w
comments.body: Families boost our confidence and make us feel loved. They are the pillars of our strength who never fall instead keep us strong so we become better people. We learn the values of love, respect, faith, hope, caring, cultures, ethics, traditions, and everything else that concerns us through our families.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: family is the person who cares about me the most. I love my family so much and so grateful to be together. supporting and helping each other is what my family has always done.
